trans-unit.source: Specifies the options that can be used when performing a hit test on the background specified by a visual style.
trans-unit.target: 指定視覺化樣式所指定的背景上執行點擊的測試時，可以使用的選項。

trans-unit.source: The HitTestOptions values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.HitTestBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: HitTestOptions 值當做引數用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.HitTestBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.HitTestBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the background segment.
trans-unit.target: 背景區段點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the caption.
trans-unit.target: 標題點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the fixed border.
trans-unit.target: 固定框線點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the resizing border.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小框線點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the bottom resizing border.
trans-unit.target: 底部調整大小框線點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the left resizing border.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小框線的左邊點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the right resizing border.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小框線的權限點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The hit test option for the top resizing border.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小框線頂端點擊的測試的選項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The resizing border is specified as a template, not just window edges.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小框線會指定為範本，而不只是視窗邊緣。

trans-unit.source: This option is mutually exclusive with SystemSizingMargins; SizingTemplate takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 此選項會與 SystemSizingMargins; 互斥SizingTemplate 會優先使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The system resizing border width is used instead of visual style content margins.
trans-unit.target: 系統的調整大小框線寬度會用來取代視覺化樣式內容的邊界。

trans-unit.source: This option is mutually exclusive with SizingTemplate; SizingTemplate takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 此選項會與 SizingTemplate; 互斥SizingTemplate 會優先使用。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
